code: import{prueba}from"./KardexFormat";export function searchDataKardex(){if(!localStorage["kardex"]){localStorage["kardex"]=JSON.stringify(prueba);}let kardex=localStorage["kardex"];kardex=JSON.parse(kardex);return kardex;}export function removeDataKardex(remove){let kardex=searchDataKardex();kardex=kardex.filter(item=>item.id!==remove);localStorage["kardex"]=JSON.stringify(kardex);}export function editDataKardex(edit){let kardex=searchDataKardex();kardex=kardex.filter(item=>item.id!==edit.id);kardex.push(edit);localStorage["kardex"]=JSON.stringify(kardex);}export function saveDataKardex(kardex){let kardexList=searchDataKardex();kardexList.push(kardex);localStorage["kardex"]=JSON.stringify(kardexList);return true;}export function reloadDataKardex(){localStorage.removeItem("kardex");return searchDataKardex();}
